description: This class, EnvConfig, reads environment variables from a file named 'env' located in the assets directory, and provides static methods to load these variables and retrieve individual entries. It is used for configuration purposes, such as setting up Supabase credentials in an Android app.

classes.name: EnvConfig
classes.description: Contains static methods and properties to load environment variables from an asset file and retrieve them.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads environment variables from the 'env' asset file into a HashMap, skipping comments and empty lines.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the value associated with a given key from the loaded environment variables.
